content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"shared mailbox\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" can be a practical solution for groups of people working from different locations. With the right permissions, any person in a group can access a shared mailbox, as well as a shared Calendar and a shared contact list.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s important to distinguish Shared Mailbox from Distribution Groups as they might be used for similar purposes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Shared Mailboxes are created by EPAM – Enterprise Administration team, but SD Processing Center can be involved in the process of granting access to already existing Shared Mailbox.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" For more information, please check the link: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/Qsj2Hw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Shared mailbox\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
